thread.title: Clavister secures private cloud for German church administration
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Clavister secures private cloud for German church administration | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Clavister secures private cloud for German church administration
text:
Sept 9 Clavister Holding AB :
* Secures private cloud for German church administration
* Announced a deployment of its Eagle series compact next-generation firewalls (NGFW) with a church administration in southern Germany
Source text for Eikon:
 (Gdynia Newsroom)
